definition: to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
to encircle/to surround/all around/to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)

sentences.english: How do you find an ‘Island of Misfit Foods’ near you?
sentences.chinese: 你是如何寻找周围的“非适当食品小岛”的呢？

sentences.english: The fibrous tissues aroud the tumor cells were positive for VG.
sentences.chinese: VG染色示肿瘤细胞周围有纤维组织反应增生。

sentences.english: Zhang Haizhou engages with people well.
sentences.chinese: 张海洲和周围人相处得很好。

sentences.english: The temperature of cold-blooded animals change with the temperature of the surroundings .
sentences.chinese: 冷血动物的体温随着周围的环境的改变而变化。

sentences.english: Hard to drink, and drink around a long time that nothing effects.
sentences.chinese: 好难喝的，周围长时间喝的说没啥效果。

sentences.english: So the Giant built a high wall all round the garden.
sentences.chinese: 于是巨人在花园周围筑起一堵高高的墙。

sentences.english: Cracks have appeared on the dam's surface and workshops at the site have collapsed .
sentences.chinese: 紫坪铺水坝的表面出现了裂纹，周围的工场也已坍塌。

sentences.english: Results of far field displacement around a circular cavity are given.
sentences.chinese: 文中给出了圆孔周围的远场位移的数值结果。

sentences.english: They had no time now for neighborhood gossip.
sentences.chinese: 如今，他们没有时间和周围的人闲扯。

sentences.english: We've really too many trees about the house but we wouldn't give up one.
sentences.chinese: 我们房子周围有太多的树了，但我们一株也不想砍掉。

sentences.english: it is said the black hole can engulf everything nearby such as stars.
sentences.chinese: 据说黑洞可以将周围的一切物体，如星星吞食掉。

sentences.english: Did you feel a sense of shame around your circumstances?
sentences.chinese: 在您周围的境况中您是否感觉到了羞耻感呢？

sentences.english: Squint your eyes a little and move your head slowly to make it look like the world is spinning around you.
sentences.chinese: 稍微眯眼，缓慢的移动你的头好想世界在你周围旋转。

sentences.english: The widow owns this building and its surrounding lands.
sentences.chinese: 这位孀妇拥有这幢大楼及其周围的地产。

sentences.english: Not just the people who might buy from you, but the people around you.
sentences.chinese: 不只是那些可能购买你的产品的人，还有你周围的人。

sentences.english: I walk around on my tippy toes.
sentences.chinese: 我走在我的周围毛尖脚趾。
